TextView.android:text: 1. W in the Body of a Word When the sound of w occurs in the body of a word, as in quick, it is represented by a short dash underneath the vowel, following the w sound. The dash is inserted after the rest of the outline has been written.
2 Ted The combination ted is represented by joining t and d into one long upward stroke.
3 Ded, Dit, Det The long stroke that represents ted also represents ded and the similar sounds of dit and det.
Observe that the d representing the past tense in audited is joined to dit with a jog.
